quizDescription.text: Answer the following questions.Write the correct option in the textbox.

questionText.text:
a. a – i , b – ii, c – iii
b. a – ii , b – i, c – iii
c. a – iii, b – ii, c – i
d. a - ii, b - iii, c- i
e. None of the above

Suppose the multiple R^2 value for a linear regression model using year and price as the independent variables was 0.81; which of the following multiple R^2 values are possible if WinterRain was added as an independent variable? (1 mark)

a. 0.76
b. 0.50
c. 0.82
d. 0.80

Which of the following is not related to Logistic regression? (0.5 mark)
a. ROC curve
b. R^2 value
c. Threshold
d. Confusion Matrix

In the following ROC cure, where a prediction of 1 implies good patient care at a hospital and a prediction of 0 implies poor care, which threshold value would you be likely choose for getting a satisfactory analysis of patients data? (1 mark)

Using all available variables in a linear regression model may cause overfitting i.e. the model achieves high R^2 on data, but performs bad on unseen data
a. True
b. False
